Momocs

    • Layered shape and multivariate plots with grindr
  • News

Subset based on positions

Select rows by position, based on $fac. See examples and ?dplyr::slice.

slice(.data, ...)

Arguments

.data

a Coo, Coe, PCA object
...

logical conditions

Value

a Momocs object of the same class.

Details

dplyr verbs are maintained.

See also

Other handling functions: arrange, at_least, chop, combine, dissolve, fac_dispatcher, filter, mutate, rescale, rm_harm, rm_uncomplete, rw_fac, sample_frac, sample_n, select, subsetize

Examples

olea
#> Opn (curves)
#>   - 210 curves, 99 +/- 4 coords (in $coo)
#>   - 4 classifiers (in $fac): 
#> # A tibble: 210 x 4
#>   var   domes view  ind  
#>   <fct> <fct> <fct> <fct>
#> 1 Aglan cult  VD    O10  
#> 2 Aglan cult  VL    O10  
#> 3 Aglan cult  VD    O11  
#> 4 Aglan cult  VL    O11  
#> 5 Aglan cult  VD    O12  
#> 6 Aglan cult  VL    O12  
#> # ... with 204 more rows
#>   - also: $ldk
slice(olea, 1) # if you only want the coordinates, try bot[1]
#> Opn (curves)
#>   - 1 curves, 99 +/- NA coords (in $coo)
#>   - 4 classifiers (in $fac): 
#> # A tibble: 1 x 4
#>   var   domes view  ind  
#>   <fct> <fct> <fct> <fct>
#> 1 Aglan cult  VD    O10  
#>   - also: $ldk
slice(olea, 1:20)
#> Opn (curves)
#>   - 20 curves, 99 +/- 4 coords (in $coo)
#>   - 4 classifiers (in $fac): 
#> # A tibble: 20 x 4
#>   var   domes view  ind  
#>   <fct> <fct> <fct> <fct>
#> 1 Aglan cult  VD    O10  
#> 2 Aglan cult  VL    O10  
#> 3 Aglan cult  VD    O11  
#> 4 Aglan cult  VL    O11  
#> 5 Aglan cult  VD    O12  
#> 6 Aglan cult  VL    O12  
#> # ... with 14 more rows
#>   - also: $ldk
slice(olea, 21:30)
#> Opn (curves)
#>   - 10 curves, 100 +/- 4 coords (in $coo)
#>   - 4 classifiers (in $fac): 
#> # A tibble: 10 x 4
#>   var   domes view  ind  
#>   <fct> <fct> <fct> <fct>
#> 1 Aglan cult  VD    O1   
#> 2 Aglan cult  VL    O1   
#> 3 Aglan cult  VD    O20  
#> 4 Aglan cult  VL    O20  
#> 5 Aglan cult  VD    O21  
#> 6 Aglan cult  VL    O21  
#> # ... with 4 more rows
#>   - also: $ldk
